IEP_Template_Age7_SpecialNeed.question: How frequently does the student participate in group activities?

benchmark.qualificationText: Goal is met if the student willingly participates in group activities more than 70% of the time.

IEP_Template_Age7_SpecialNeed.question: Is the student able to express emotions and handle conflicts?

benchmark.qualificationText: Goal is met if the student can express emotions and resolve conflicts appropriately.

IEP_Template_Age7_SpecialNeed.question: Can the student read and understand age-appropriate texts?

benchmark.qualificationText: Goal is met if the student can read and comprehend age-appropriate texts.

IEP_Template_Age7_SpecialNeed.question: How well does the student handle transitions between activities?

benchmark.qualificationText: Goal is met if the student can transition between activities without significant disruption.

IEP_Template_Age7_SpecialNeed.question: Is the student able to complete tasks with multiple steps?

benchmark.qualificationText: Goal is met if the student can complete tasks that have multiple steps.
